e_commerce.asgi module¶

ASGI config for e_commerce project.

It exposes the ASGI callable as a module-level variable named application.

For more information on this file, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/3.1/howto/deployment/asgi/

e_commerce.utils module¶

e_commerce.utils.load_secrets(file_name)¶

This function loads secrets from the YAML file by given name.

Parameters

file_name (str) – name of the YAML file with secrets
